text: "Airport" is a 1978 song by English power pop band The Motors and was taken from their second studio album Approved by the Motors. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom and Sweden, number 8 in Ireland, number 5 in France, number 3 in Israel, number 37 in New Zealand, number 31 in Australia, number 15 in Finland and number 26 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Airport (song)
